Reviews.Title: “Excellent hotel - very good location in front of the tram station”
Reviews.Author: Mandy078
Reviews.Content: husband daughter 25 stayed notting hill hã´tel 4 nights april 2012 hã´tel brand modern nice design clean lucky view canal breakfast splendid fresh orange juice plenty choice start day conditions staff specially little daughter helped finding restaurants booking thank staff fabulous stay

Reviews.Title: “The nicest staff in Amsterdam!”
Reviews.Author: BritChikOhio
Reviews.Content: sick stay month thanks bowl mussels hotel nearby restaurant staff sending warm water plates dry toast couldnt nicer called okay beyong service thanks hasnt coming favorite city favorite hotel

Reviews.Title: “Lack of Service, No Atmosphere”
Reviews.Author: LucyDragon
Reviews.Content: live amsterdam decided romantic break chose hotel arrived 8pm informed free upgrade deluxe happy arrived slightly confused wondering cramped deluxe dinner restaurant absolutely atmosphere strange desolate vibe decided remain downstairs drink morning requested late check told check 6pm charged stay till 3 checked late kindly allowed called 30mins reception proceeded argue 15 minutes telling uncertain terms lying requested check 6 pm charged utter bs reception advised check immediately charged instead nice relaxing afternoon rushed check time downstairs despite resolution unpleasant lady duty continued argue 10 minutes complete waste time million travel events coordinator experienced complete lack service waste money

Reviews.Title: “Excellent stay !”
Reviews.Author: Sarah R
Reviews.Content: leaving central station decided walk hotel lovely day didnt luggage half hour easy tram 10 mins hotel luxurious staff helpful enjoyed coming resting legs tiring day sightseeing beds comfy bathroom immaculate highly recommended

Reviews.Title: “What a wonderful find”
Reviews.Author: Beverley B
Reviews.Content: husband recently stayed 3 days celebrate wedding anniversary gone budapest due bad weather cancelled flights selected hotel fantastic highly rate hotel decor boutique style accomodation extremely helpful staff pleasant trouble left beautiful bottle wine whilst hotel centre walking distance tram stop immediately outside hotel air market minutes shops coffee houses supermarkets pleased hotel hope return summer

Reviews.Title: “A charming, well located boutique with terrific service”
Reviews.Author: skip93
Reviews.Content: ive spent 5 lovely nights hotel recommend looking located touristy setting close museums desired sites astoundingly beautiful city lovely bar lounge fun video screen roaring fire amsterdam warms staff friendly helpful bar tender makes drinks food intimate restaurant excellent definitely please eye smart design details bathrooms fresh laid hallways bright quiet beds comfy fine linens definitely return soon

Reviews.Title: “true boutique hotel”
Reviews.Author: MTL1969
Reviews.Content: intimate personable property chain attractive contemporary design paid eur 150 deal hotel top floor windows shown ones friendly lady reception choose thats customer service free coffee tea wifi touch teething property light sensor bathroom practical middle night wait 5 mins light solution remove key card electricity mains solved reception told replacing sensors oldfashioned switches location trams walking distance pijp touristy attractive

Reviews.Title: “Luxury in a quiet corner of Amsterdam”
Reviews.Author: Glukija
Reviews.Content: indeed clean modern spacious called nice view traffic square pics bikes trams friendly staff luxurious coffee machine girls alas george clooney birthday threw free bottle wine restaurant surrounding ones cold wind blowing enjoyed wine center makes quiet trams stopping nearby 125 euro center fast oneway nice offer

Reviews.Title: “It was PERFECT”
Reviews.Author: ChrisJ522
Reviews.Content: hotel reasonable expected inside budget hotel couldnt spent 100 euros worst worth maybe downside wasnt close downtown beside heineken experience nice location

Reviews.Title: “Relaxing time away”
Reviews.Author: morley3003
Reviews.Content: arrived hotel pleasantly surprised hotel pictures tell half story 3rd floor view overlooking looked residential couldnt complain noise heard trams staff interacted meal hotel restaurant 1st night worth penny paid opted breakfast hotel found sample local eateries brunch downside panels lights generate light bright isnt total darkness night trendy hotel outskirts amsterdam centre short 10 minutes tram journey stop outside hotel door access easy recommend

Reviews.Title: “Excellent new hotel in Amsterdam!”
Reviews.Author: Sjurontour
Reviews.Content: found lovely star hotel amsterdam located centre dutch national bank hotel short stroll colourful albert cuyp street market shopping street lovely reception staffed friendly people little lounge nice bar pleasant restaurant nice comfortable beds modern furniture airco makes feel north pole recommend hotel

Reviews.Title: “design hotel”
Reviews.Author: doktordod
Reviews.Content: nice hotel design confortable bathroom please automatic switch lights bathroom tell ur clients breakfast staff nice helpful central station reach directly hotel tram 4 24 stops price common amsterdam anice stay

Reviews.Title: “New, clean, convenient”
Reviews.Author: F550M
Reviews.Content: location near tram metro walking distance heineken experience nice clean friendly helpful desk breakfast expensive included bathrooms glass doors bit wierd sharing spouse hung sheet sharing teens return

Reviews.Title: “Good, but service must be improved”
Reviews.Author: Eglevit
Reviews.Content: hotel brand size shower nice service improved 30 minutes check personal unexperienced tried charge twice breakfast phone call travel agent breakfast prepaid water minibar pillow impossible sleep location center tramway outside hotel

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful Design, Good Service, Need some perfection of the last details”
Reviews.Author: BerlinBen
Reviews.Content: beautiful hotel love design hotel location perfect centre amsterdam quiet staff front desk helpful friendly free wifi hotel hotel improvement details couple weeks ready example minibars arrived telephone buttons elevator decor nice beds perfect definitely hotel

Reviews.Title: “Potential to be a great hotel, just give them time (3.5 stars)”
Reviews.Author: shoegirlinDE
Reviews.Content: realized brand hotel days arrived surprised loose discovered overall beautiful stylish stay lacked obvious polish hotel awhile front desk staff times little disheveled unsure protocol lacking option knowledge overall pleasant helpful hotel located major restaurant bars makes quieter town close walk ill pass ie getting mini fridges fixing elevators floor buckets dirty tools laying couple maid staff tossed soaps replaced towels day tossed personal soap brought realized left disturb button everythings modern electronic didnt anyway minor nice guests option wasteful decide didnt major bothered probably american modesty privacy door bathroom completely transparent glass ive seen lot travelling throughout europe time bed direct view toilet romantic door didnt close door handle latch looked door frame frame inch gap door hung little im assuming based door design theyre offputting faced street nice view trees canal tram stops front hotel convenient sounds low roll thunder 20 minutes overly loud surprising times size european standards spectacularly clean bed comfortable surprised awful lumpy pillows resulted wear apparently thats theyre purchased polish service crossing outstanding todos doing bathroom doors potential 45 star stay hope hear reviewers improvements stay trip amsterdam
